event.title: A yearly activity conducted every last week

data.event: Pista sa Kinaiyahan A yearly activity conducted every last week of April as a tribute to the Mother Nature through tree-growing, cleanup activities and Boulder Face challenge.
Araw ng Santa Cruz It is celebrated every October 5 in commemoration of the legal creation of the municipality in 1884.

event.title: the legal creation of the municipality in 1884

data.event: Araw ng Santa Cruz It is celebrated every October 5 in commemoration of the legal creation of the municipality in 1884.
Sinabbadan Festival A festival of ethnic ritual and dances celebrated every September.
